Name: Fissure
Effect: Single Target. Low Accuracy 5. Ranged. Deal Damage to the Target equal to its Remaining HP, plus 1 Lethal Damge. If the Target is out of range due to using the Move "Dig" this Move hits anyways.
Description: The earth rips apart underneath the target and swallows them whole. Youâ€™ll need a rescue team to recover the unlucky victim from the deep.
